title: Mississippi Firm Recalls Frozen Chicken Meals Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, July 31, 2013 Traditions, a Pearl, Miss., establishment, is recalling 2,486 pounds of frozen chicken meals because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service announced today. The products contain milk, a known allergen, which is...
